info.name: Mega Tyranitar Pokemon Showdown Skin
info.description: This is a Mega Tyranitar Theme. This theme affects Smogon University(main) and all "psim.us" servers. If you like this style, don't hesitate to drop a like and positive comment, and if you have any issues with this theme or any bugs, you can find me at a server such as Wisp under the name @Master Float.
